entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Temiskaming Shores
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:33 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -32.4°C

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 35 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33 with temperature rising to minus 28 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33 with temperature rising to minus 28 by morning. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
